text: Volodymyr Oleksiiovych Struk (; 15 May 1964 – 2 March 2022) was a Ukrainian politician. He was a member of the Party of Regions and later the Opposition Platform — For Life. He was in the Verkhovna Rada from 2012 to 2014. He was later Mayor of Kreminna from 2020 until his death. Struk was found shot dead in Kreminna at the age of 57 during the 2022 Russian invasion of Ukraine. Before his death, he was kidnapped from his home after showing support of Russia during the invasion. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Members of the Verkhovna Rada Category:Murders by firearm Category:Assassinated Ukrainian people Category:Ukrainian mayors
title: Volodymyr Struk
